June 1, 1959
Mrs. Marye D. Benjamin
Badio-Television Script Editor
University of "exas
Austin 12, ^exae
r-ear Marye:
1 am happy to send you forthwith a complete
dossier which you are free to use in any trs you
see fit.
. Faded likenesses of myself have been
distributed widely and I assume there must be one
at least in the local post office.
Cordially yours.
William G. Harley
